text: The World's Greatest Lover is a 1977 American comedy movie directed by Gene Wilder (who also stars) and starring Carol Kane, Dom DeLuise, Danny DeVito, Fritz Feld, Ronny Graham. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Gene Wilder Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in the 1920s
title: The World's Greatest Lover
